description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Virus War is an intense and fast paced shooter game. Fight your way through a virus infiltrated environment. Your mission is to annihilate and destroy various viruses. You will encounter multiple types of viruses with all distinctive behaviours.
description.short: Virus War is an intense and fast paced shooter game. Fight your way through a virus infiltrated environment. Your mission is to annihilate and destroy various viruses. You will encounter multiple types of viruses with all distinctive behaviours.
